user_query: I am organizing a company gathering and would like to offer a variety of pizzas and desserts to the attendees, and I need to know the nutritional information of a specific dish.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the details of available pizzas, including their names, prices, and descriptions.
Retrieve the details of available dessert options, including their names, prices, and descriptions.
Get the nutritional information for the dish with UPC 4019300005154.
